channel.title: questions on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in questions on Barefoot Rob

item.title: need to write
item.description: Catching Up Thursday 10 September 1998 Yes, I haven't written in a while. Sigh.. Sometimes I feel so bogged down and I have so much fun stuff to write!! Tulsa Rally was last weekend, dinner at Niko Niko's was last night, and I've had lots of anti-fun with my scanner not working! But I'm here on campus at UH again; just ate lunch and said HI to Nikki and Sara and am about to go to Scholars' Community where I used to work on campus.
